bill.title: MS Organic Certification Program; reenact and extend repealer on provisions of.
bill.description: An Act To Reenact Sections 69-47-1, 69-47-5, 69-47-7, 69-47-9, 69-47-13, 69-47-17, 69-47-19, 69-47-21, 69-47-23 And 69-47-27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Establish The Mississippi Organic Certification Program And Prescribe The Various Provisions For Its Administration And Operation; To Bring Forward Section 69-47-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For The Recertification Of A Farm, Field Or Greenhouse After Removal From Organic Management; To Bring Forward Section 69-47-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Requires The Department Of Agriculture And Commerce To Conduct Audits Of Entities Operating Under Provision Of The Mississippi Organic Certification Program; To Bring Forward Section 69-47-25, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Requires The Establishment And Payment Of Inspection And Renewal Fees For Certification; To Create New Section 69-47-28, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide For The Repeal Of The Mississippi Organic Certification Program On July 1, 2016; And For Related Purposes.
